mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodCpstGodCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , CPST_GOD_NO , CPST_GOD_NM , PCKAGE_GOD_TP_CD , ESSNTL_PCH_YN , ADIT_PCH_PSB_YN , CPST_GOD_QTY , SORT_SEQ , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_CPST_GOD_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CPST_GOD_NO = #{cpstGodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
